about_the_game:
Dear players, we are pleased to present you a sponsored add-on to the game, for your support we will give you unique customization options that will distinguish you from other players!

Your stylized avatar will be available to all game users, allowing you to stand out from other players. You can describe what you'd like your avatar to look like, or provide an image, you can also provide a description of yourself and your interests, and we'll add it to your avatar along with a link to your social networks if you wish.

You will have access to all frames and avatars in the game, regardless of your Battle Pass subscription level.

Please note that fulfilling the conditions may take some time, as we will need to carefully consider and implement all the details. We are confident that the result will meet your expectations, and we will do our best.

We appreciate your support and are ready to work with you throughout the process to ensure your requirements are fully met. If you have any questions or requests, feel free to contact us and we will be happy to answer all your questions.

Dear players, we are pleased to present you a sponsored add-on to the game, for your support we will give you unique customization options that will distinguish you from other players!

Your stylized avatar will be available to all game users, allowing you to stand out from other players. You can describe what you'd like your avatar to look like, or provide an image, you can also provide a description of yourself and your interests, and we'll add it to your avatar along with a link to your social networks if you wish.

You will have access to all frames and avatars in the game, regardless of your Battle Pass subscription level.

Please note that fulfilling the conditions may take some time, as we will need to carefully consider and implement all the details. We are confident that the result will meet your expectations, and we will do our best.

We appreciate your support and are ready to work with you throughout the process to ensure your requirements are fully met. If you have any questions or requests, feel free to contact us and we will be happy to answer all your questions.
name: Answenarium: Support Pack
short_description: A stylized avatar based on your descriptionAccess to all avatars regardless of battle pass level
